Klasse ProfileUnternehmenView

java.lang.Object
com.vaadin.flow.component.Component
com.vaadin.flow.component.Composite<com.vaadin.flow.component.orderedlayout.VerticalLayout>
com.spirit.application.views.profil.ProfileBaseView
com.spirit.application.views.profil.Unternehmen.ProfileUnternehmenView
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
com.vaadin.flow.component.AttachNotifier, com.vaadin.flow.component.DetachNotifier, com.vaadin.flow.component.HasElement, com.vaadin.flow.component.HasStyle, Serializable
@Route(value="unternehmen/profil", layout=AppView.class) @RolesAllowed("unternehmen") public class ProfileUnternehmenView extends ProfileBaseView
View for displaying and editing the profil of the currently logged-in company user. This view is accessible only to users with the "UNTERNEHMEN" role.

This class extends `ProfileBaseView` to reuse shared functionality for profil management.
